title: Bengali fish curry
description: This recipe is traditionally made with mustard oil but we’ve found that a combination of mustard seeds and English mustard powder brings just the right level of heat and flavour to this simple dish.
ingredients: 2 sea bass or sea bream fillets (each around 200g/7oz), scales removed but skin on
1 tsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to season
2 long green chillies,  stalk trimmed and cut in half without deseeding
150g/5½oz rice, cooked according to packet instructions
